name: Faction Territories and Influence
prompt: Top-down tactical map: Faction Territories and Influence, no tactical grid; focus on labeled overlays, base relief with bathymetry/sky currents, overlay symbology with legend, layered export with toggles per theme, Use aspect and resolution as specified, maintain consistent styling tags, include negative prompts to avoid artifacts.
alt_text: Faction Territories and Influence overlay for world map with clear legend.
